alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:58AM CST until January 12 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... East central Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 158 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ola, or 13 miles southeast of Danville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atkins... Petit Jean State Park... Carden Bottoms... Galla Creek WMA... Casa... Birta... Ada... Carter Cove Park... Lakeview in Yell County... Nimrod... Holla Bend... Pontoon... Fourche Junction... Garden Point Recreation Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas.
